summary: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.
cast: Siddharth|Bobby Simha|Lakshmi Menon|Nassar|Aadukalam Naren|Guru Somasundaram|Karunakaran|Sangili Murugan|Delhi Ganesh|Ambika|Sudha|Bagavathi Perumal|Rajkumar|Vinodhini Vaidynathan|Ramachandran|Soundara Raja|Kaalaiyan|Thennavan|Bala Singh|Ajay Ratnam|Senthil Kumaran|Anthony Dasan|Vijay Sethupathi|Vetrimaaran|Ramachandran Durairaj|Gajaraj|Nalan Kumarasamy|Munishkanth
title: Jigarthanda
